treatYourselfPara.text: Enjoy a variety of unlimited beauty care services every month with our Soins Karismä salons across the country!

advanceTechnologyPara.text: Gain access to our unique platform where you can book, cancel or move appointments seamlessly. Communicate with a salon expert immediately!

cancellationPara.text: No cancellation fees for the membership! However, they are limited to a certain number of people, so hold your spot and take advantage!

unlimitCarePara.text: With the membership you will have the option to choose any of our offered services. For only 90USD per month, you will have unlimited care services whether it be hair treatments, or esthetic treatments, we have it all! Treat yourself from month to month with proper care

accessPlatformPara.text: With access to the Soins Karismä platform, you will have access to our educational content, unique social media center and booking system. Choose and book from hundreds of Soins Karismä salons across the country within seconds. Keep yourself entertained with our unique social media platform and share your experiences or more. The options are endless!

easyBookingPara.text: With our advanced technology, you have the ability to book, cancel or move an appointment. Book unforgettable beauty and wellness experiences with the mobile app – the best way to discover our salons, spas and beauty care centers. Get in communication with our support team 24h/7 if you are experiencing problems.

unlimitedBeautyservicesPara.text: Soins Karismä wanted to revolutionize the way we see beauty care services. Affording services from month to month can be a burden financially. This is why we offer beauty care services for a fixed price every month! Come as often as you want to any Soins Karismä salon across the world for only 90 USD per month. Reserve your subscription because they are limited! Whether it be hair services or esthetic services or any other, we have it all. Choose your salon in your region using our platform and book!

imSpeechlessPara.text: Soins Karismä wanted to revolutionize the way we see beauty care services. Affording services from month to month can be a burden financially. This is why we offer beauty care services for a fixed price every month! Come as often as you want to any Soins Karismä salon across the world for only 90 USD per month. Reserve your subscription because they are limited! Whether it be hair services or esthetic services or any other, we have it all. Choose your salon in your region using our platform and book!

exceptionalServicePara.text: As a 35 year old mother of two kids I need to treat myself from time to time and Soins Karismä gives me the opportunity to do so every single month. The exceptional service that they give is never before seen for me. If I have problems there is someone to answer me all the time.

crazyOfferPara.text: The offer is above and beyond what you can imagine. I have access to everything from one spot and I can go to any Soins Karismä salon as well. Three words to describe this company; innovative, creative and exceptional. The offer is crazy, I could not be happier with my purchase.

chooseSubscriptionPara.text: We have everything you need! Enjoy unlimited beauty, wellness services and travel experience month by month with the best professionals.Come as many times as you want to any Soins Karismä salon and wellness center in the world, book your travel experience and connect with a unique community. Choose the subscription that you like the most and reserve your place because they are limited!
